text:
Created attachment 33136
custom remove table code

I have a workbook(xlsx), in one sheet have 2 Tables initially. During the program process logic I need to remove one Table, but I can't found the direct interface method to remove it.
Currently I use Sheet's PackageRelationshipCollection and CTTableParts to remove it then save it to temp object and read it again to finish the remove table function.
creator: jiangguangtao@foxmail.com

text: Please e-mail usage questions like this to user@poi.apache.org in the first instance. If after that you have a specific request for a missing method which you would like added, then raise a bug.
creator: dtn-asfbugs@corefiling.co.uk
